# Alejandro Hirsch - Senior Web Developer

> Experienced web developer with 10+ years of expertise in frontend development, specializing in modern JavaScript frameworks (Vue.js, React, TypeScript) and e-commerce solutions. Operating at 10x capacity through seamless AI integration.

## Professional Profile

Alejandro Hirsch is a highly skilled, trilingual (Spanish, English, German) web developer based in Innsbruck, Austria. He has a proven track record of delivering robust, high-quality web applications for diverse industries including fintech, e-commerce, and enterprise solutions.

### Key Highlights
- **10+ Years Experience:** Extensive background in frontend architecture and implementation.
- **AI-Native Workflow:** Leverages AI tools to deliver solutions with exceptional speed, precision, and efficiency (10x capacity).
- **Technology Stack:** Expert in Vue.js (Nuxt.js), React (Next.js), TypeScript, and WordPress.
- **Industry Experience:** Worked with leading Austrian companies such as Pixelart, Monkee Rocks, P8 Marketing, and INNIO.
- **Architecture:** Strong focus on clean code, design patterns, and native web technologies (Web Components, Shadow DOM).

## Technical Skills

### Core Technologies
- **Languages:** JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, CSS3 (Tailwind, Styled Components), HTML5, PHP, SQL.
- **Frameworks:** Vue.js (Level 5/5), React (Level 4/5), WordPress (Level 5/5), Nuxt.js, Next.js.
- **Methodologies:** OOP, REST APIs, CI/CD, SPA, PWA, SEO, Design Patterns.

### Tools & DevOps
- **Development:** Git, Vite, Webpack, Cypress (Testing), VS Code.
- **Environments:** Linux, Windows, Node.js, Docker.
- **Management:** Jira, Atlassian, Agile/Scrum.

## Professional Experience

- **alta gama (Innsbruck, 2023–Present):** Independent Senior Frontend Developer.
- **Pixelart (Salzburg, 2023):** Frontend Developer focusing on Pimcore and Vue.js.
- **Monkee Rocks (Innsbruck, 2021–2022):** Lead frontend implementation for a fintech portal using React and Cypress.
- **P8 Marketing (Innsbruck, 2021):** Developed headless WordPress themes with Vue.js.
- **INNIO (Jenbach, 2019–2020):** Consultant and developer for enterprise web portal migration and rollout.
- **IAESTE Innsbruck (Innsbruck, 07/2016 — 06/2018):** President (voluntary) — General direction of the committee.
- **IAESTE Innsbruck (Innsbruck, 09/2015 — 06/2016):** Exchange coordinator (voluntary) — Review and supervision of internship candidates.

## Education & Languages

- **Education:** Computer Science studies at Universität Innsbruck; various certifications in web technologies.
- **Languages:**
  - **Spanish:** Native
  - **English:** Advanced (C1)
  - **German:** Advanced (C1)

## Optional / Background

- **Glider Pilot:** Holds a glider pilot license, demonstrating discipline and precision.

- **Location:** Based in Innsbruck, Austria, with experience in international rollouts (e.g., Mexico).
